scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && npm run docker:wait && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver
scripts.docker:wait: until [ "$(docker inspect -f '{{.State.Health.Status}}' ctrlchic_postgres 2>/dev/null)" = "healthy" ]; do echo 'Waiting for PostgreSQL to be ready...'; sleep 2; done && echo 'PostgreSQL is ready!'
scripts.install:all: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
